name: The Propagation of Bamboo
description:
The Propagation of Bamboo is a game about propagating bamboo! Made for the Random WikiHow Jam #2 after drawing this article: https://www.wikihow.com/Propagate-Bamboo

Manage your bamboo farm, performing a variety of minigames for actions like planting, cutting, watering, and weeding bamboo. Sell your harvested bamboo shoots or use them to plant more bamboo! But watch out for the pandas - they're coming for your bamboo!

Use:

  • Bamboo shoots to plant more bamboo
  • A blade to harvest bamboo
  • A trowel to weed your plots
  • A watering can to boost your bamboo's growth
  • A hammer to repair your fence and keep the pesky pandas out
  • The marketplace to sell your bamboo

Upgrade:

  • Your kitchen knife into a saw and a katana to speed up the cutting process
  • Your fence to keep the pandas out better
  • Your shoots with growth hormones and wax dip to speed growth and increase damage resistance

This game was made using Unity3D.

Credits:

  • Nathan Stubbs (Coder)
  • Chase Odom (Coder)
  • Calvin Dao (Coder)
  • Dinah Baum (Coder)
  • Eduardo Rojas Jr. (Artist)
  • Miguel Martinez (Sound)
